definition: bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam
(bird species of China) oriental pied hornbill (Anthracoceros albirostris)
(bird species of China) rufous-necked hornbill (Aceros nipalensis)
(bird species of China) white-throated brown hornbill (Anorrhinus austeni)
(bird species of China) wreathed hornbill (Rhyticeros undulatus)
pinyin: hua1 guan1 zhou4 kui1 xi1 niao3

definition: (bird species of China) great hornbill (Buceros bicornis)

sentences.english: The Toucan has a large yellow and black beak and blue striped wings.
sentences.chinese: 犀鳥款有一個黃色和黑色的嘴和藍色條紋的翅膀。

sentences.english: The flying hornbill represents our home state, Sarawak, taking us from Borneo to the host country, China, which is represented by the panda.
sentences.chinese: 犀鳥代表我們故鄉砂拉越，以及熊貓代表主人家中國。

sentences.english: Here, a behind-the-scenes look at a southern ground hornbill on set.
sentences.chinese: 這是一張花絮照，被拍攝的是一隻南方犀鳥。
